mapper.insert: insert into hotel ( name, type, picture_path, status, description, create_time, update_time, theme_id, price, location, indexs, hotel_meta_id ) values (#{name},#{type},#{picturePath},#{status},#{description}, #{createTime},#{updateTime},#{themeId},#{price},#{location},#{indexs},#{hotel_meta_id})
mapper.select: select * from hotel r where r.id=#{id}
select * from Hotel r where r.name=#{name}
select * from Hotel r where r.status = #{status} order by r.create_time desc
select * from Hotel r where r.category = #{category} order by r.create_time desc
select * from Hotel r where r.name like '%${name}%' or r.placeTags like '%${name}%' order by r.create_time desc
